Stop-loss strategy: Sell when price falls by 10% from current price or when DBR increases by more than 2% from current level.
Sell when the stock price falls by 15% from the current price or when the ROE and ROA indicators show a significant decline.
If the stock price falls by 15% or more from the current price, trigger a sell order.
Trigger a sell order when the stock price falls by 15% from the current price.
Trigger a sell order when the stock price falls by 15% from the current price, or when the ROE and ROA indicators show a significant decline.
